description: Promotes Lasker and Lasker Surf Outfitters of 402 and 404 George St, Sydney, N.S.W. Women and men model bathing suits and caps on a beach. Shots include the models standing next to a surf boat, models with parasols, and a model putting on a beach coat. (Cinema advertisement, includes intertitles).
